Counter.Title: Total cash prizes paid out so far

Title: Explore
and Win
Subtitles: Discover and Download Games You Love
Captions: AdQuest has tons of games to help you earn Eggs points! Find games that excite you and download them directly from the AdQuest app.
After downloading, start playing to earn Eggs (points). The more missions you complete, the more Eggs you’ll rack up!
Once you’ve saved up enough Eggs, go to the Rewards page in AdQuest and exchange them for prizes like DANA or OVO balance.
